contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Graft-De Rijp |image_map = LocatieGraft-DeRijp.png |mapsize = 250px |image_flag = Graft-De Rijp vlag.svg |flag_size = 120x100px |image_shield =Coat_of_arms_of_Graft-De_Rijp.svg |shield_size = 120x100px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Holland]] |leader_name = H.R. Oosterop-van Leussen |leader_party = [[Democrats 66|D66]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 21.75 |area_land_km2 = 20.10 |area_water_km2 = 1.65 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 6590 |population_density_km2 = 328 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 52.57 |latNS = N |longd = 4.85 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.graftderijp.nl www.graftderijp.nl] }} '''Graft-De Rijp''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Graft-De Rijp.ogg}}) is a municipality in the [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[North Holland]]. It is [[Town twinning|twinned]] with [[Chalfont St Giles]] in England. ==Population centres == The municipality of Graft-De Rijp consists of the following towns, villages and/or districts: [[De Rijp]], [[Graft, Netherlands|Graft]], [[Markenbinnen]], [[Noordeinde, Graft-De Rijp|Noordeinde]], [[Oost-Graftdijk]], [[Starnmeer]], [[West-Graftdijk]]. <gallery> File:De Rijp - Waag.jpg|Former [[weigh house]] and [[Town Hall, De Rijp|Town hall]] of [[De Rijp]], designed by [[Jan Leeghwater]] in 1630 File:Overzicht van de rechter zijgevel met trapgevel - Graft - 20379936 - RCE.jpg|Town Hall of Graft, built in 1613 in the style of [[Hendrick de Keyser]] </gallery> == Local government == The municipal council of Graft-De Rijp consists of 13 seats, which are divided as follows: * [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] - 4 seats * [[Labour Party (Netherlands)|PvdA]] - 4 seats * [[People's Party for Freedom and Democracy|VVD]] - 4 seats * Gemeentebelangen - 1 seat == References== * [http://www.polderwijzer.nl Polderwijzer.nl: Municipality startpage] * Statistics are taken from the [http://www.sdu.nl/staatscourant/gemeentes/gem178nh.htm SDU Staatscourant] {{commons category}} {{Geographic location | Centre = Graft-De Rijp | North = [[Schermer]] | East = [[Beemster]] | Southeast = [[Wormerland]] | South = [[Zaanstad]] | Southwest = [[Uitgeest]] | West = [[Castricum]] }} {{North Holland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Holland]] {{NorthHolland-geo-stub}}
